# Causal_Organic_Indirect_and_Direct_Effects

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Causal_Organic_Indirect_and_Direct_Effects is to write R code that implements a mediation analysis similar to the paper by Lok and Bosch.
